value.title: Create custom GIF visuals and use them in Power BI

value.title: Create stunning reports with less effort with this setting!
value.excerpt: How can you with no effort besides the original set up, create stunning reports every single time? In this tutorial, i will show you how to set up a custom background for every new page automatically, so you reports wont look dull and white and will stand out among the crowds.
